title: (x) Musée d'Archéologie in Nice & www.douglasgoldsmith.com unicase serif - Filosofia {Jan Erdmann}
content:
I saw this font at the Musée d’Archéologie in Nice and again online at [www.douglasgoldsmith.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010133956/http:/www.douglasgoldsmith.com/ "www.douglasgoldsmith.com") . Can anyone tell me the name of the font?

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Serif face on Alexander Keith beer poster - ITC Leawood {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010133956/http:/typophile.com/node/34028 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Clarendon looking font - ITC Bookman {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010133956/http:/typophile.com/node/34017 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nutbird

comments.content: Wow that was quick. Thanks a lot!

4 minutes is rather slow ;-)

You’re welcome.
